content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (37.0, -85.0)
- Burner mining drill (x=37.0, y=-85.0) mining coal
- Collection chest (x=36.5, y=-86.5) containing 15 coal

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28.0, -61.0)
Complex mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Collection chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace (x=-27.0, y=-58.0) for smelting
- Multiple burner inserters connecting components
- Output chest (x=-24.5, y=-58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Mining Complex at (-10.0, -59.0)
Large iron mining setup with:
- Three burner mining drills in sequence (x=-10.0/-8.0/-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Multiple collection chests (x=-9.5/-7.5/-5.5, y=-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters for automation

### Smelting Line at (0.0, 0.0)
Large smelting array consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces in sequence (x=0.0/2.0/4.0/6.0, y=0.0)
- Input chests at (x=0.5/2.5/4.5/6.5, y=-2.5)
- Output chests at (x=0.5/2.5/4.5/6.5, y=2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters automating input/output
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation Setup at (4.5, 20.5)
Power generation system with:
- Steam engine at (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Offshore pump at (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles at (x=11.5/7.5, y=20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Multiple "out of fuel" warnings across mining drills and inserters
- Ensure all burner devices are supplied with fuel (coal) regularly
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems for continuous operation

### Fluid System Errors
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler, steam engine and water pump
- Check for disconnected pipe segments in the fluid network

### Entity Placement and Connection Errors
- Multiple "waiting for space in destination" warnings
- Ensure proper spacing between entities and clear paths for inserters
- Verify that all inserters have valid pickup and drop-off points

### Power Distribution Errors
- Lab showing "no power" status
- Ensure electric poles are properly connected to power generators
- Check that power consumers are within electric pole coverage

### Resource Flow Errors
- Multiple "waiting for source items" warnings on inserters
- Ensure proper item flow through the production chain
- Check for bottlenecks in resource transportation systems
